WorkItem.ClosedComment: This will be fixed in next release, no workaround exists.
WorkItem.Description:
If I use Fire talent spec, Rawr working correctly.
The problem is with Arcane spec.
 
 
Steps to reproduce:
Run Rawr
Open Character File
Optimizer - Optimize 
After Optimize (any level of Thoroughness) before displaying results:
 
Rawr,exe crash
 
Rawr offline error message:
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.
 
== Version: 4.1.5.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
[Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException]
Argumenty: 
Ladění zdrojových řetězců není k dispozici. Dostatečné informace pro diagnostiku potíží často poskytují klíč a argumenty. Viz také http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60310.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException

Comments.Message: If you need any cooperation, I am ready to cooperate. For example ask me of any other info important to you, testing some version with debug code and sending results etc. I am programmer.
The fix is already in. You can try to build from source code if you don't want to wait for next release to come out.
